name: scorpio
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] the eighth sign of the zodiac, relating to the period 23 October to 21 November and represented by a scorpion (= a small creature that has a curved tail with a poisonous sting), or a person born during this period: His star sign is Scorpio. My birthday is 5 November so I'm a Scorpio. Compare
Scorpius
More examplesFewer examplesScorpio is a water sign.Scorpios can be intensely possessive and jealous.These are typical Scorpio traits.

the eighth sign of the zodiac, covering the period October 24 to November 21 and represented by a scorpion, or a person born during this period
